name: Monster(Story)
description:
Today you go to school for a normal day.
 The day turned not so well.
 A monster came and attacked!
Then you had to fight to survive!
 Monster [Story] NEW!!!  
Beta Version; 
 -Bug fixes fixed
 -anti-cheat
 -added wins leaderboard
Only on Roblox! 
Available on all devices but console(check download instructions).
